A few hours after you leave the training ground, you come across a wounded man lying under a tree. He says he too was attacked by bandits. You share your water with him and try to dress his wounds as best as you can. He tells you he is a traveling doctor. To thank you for your help, he hands you a small bronze artifact which he says was once given to him in payment by a warrior who said only that it was related to 'Neretzes' Folly.' He suspects it might be of great value. You resolve to find out more. The doctor gives you one more bit of information. He overheard the bandits talking about captives they had seized on their raids. They planned to part ways, with one group taking their prisoners to the south, and the other planning to head northwest to sell them to pirates at the port of Ostican. You may be able to help your brother by searching there for your siblings.

Also, I’ll be straight with you, seeing as you’ll find out soon enough anyway. If I recall right, we already sold off your sister to those pirates in Ostican. I remember faces well, you see, and one of them looked a bit like you. So… Here’s what I can do for you. With luck, I can help you get your brother back. Your sister – well, I know nothing of ships and the sea, so I couldn’t tell you where they might have taken her. I’m sorry, but I won’t promise you what I can’t deliver.
